Changelog
---------

0.3.1 - 0.3.2
=============

* Fixed unicode problems with Archetypes accessors

* Documentation clean ups


0.3.0 - 0.3.1
=============

* Fixed problem in plone.py with problematic Archetypes schema fields

0.1.1 - 0.3.0
=============

* Major rework

0.1 - 0.1.1
=============

* Fixing PyPi deployment problems

0.1 
=============

* Initial release
